name: Little Bat
description:
Here's my submission to the Creative Jam 10.  The themes are trapped and street light.  

There are many insects trapped between two street lights.  Your mission is to eat as many of them as you can.  Do not hit the ground and do not fly higher than the moon.

Pressing X will change your direction.  Eating insects gives you energy to keep you flying.  Be careful not to accumulate too much energy or you will fly over the moon.

Good luck.
